rn_layer * rn_layer_alloc (unsigned int nlayers)

Function Documentation

rn_layer* rn_layer_alloc ( unsigned int  nlayers  ) 

This function allocates the layers to the rn_lps during the rn_startup phase, which is multi-threaded
